Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Yakinana imana vali'am ne dovam sasaram vica safalata prapata kiti hai
jihare apani namaza la'i jhukana vale hana
Ate jihare phalatu galam tom bacade hana
Ate zakata ada karana vale hana
Ate jihare apane gupata agam di rakhi'a karana vale hana
Binham apani'am patani'am de ate unham auratam de jihari'am unham di malaki'ata vica hona ki unham nala saga karana vica ko'i mara nahim
Ham jihare unham tom binham horam de ichuka hana ate iha hadam tapana vale hana
Ate jihare apani'am amanatam ate ikararam da dhi'ana rakhana vale hana
Ate jihare apani'am namazam di rakhi'a karade hane
Tam uha hi loka varisa hona vale hana, jihare savaraga di virasata pa'unage
Uha usa vica hamesam rahinage
Ate asim manukha nu miti de tata tom paida kita hai
Phira asim pani di ika buda de rupa vica usa nu ika surakhi'ata tikane vica rakhi'a

Phira asim pani di ika buda tom ika bharuna da rupa dita, phira bharuna nu masa da ika lokara bana'i'a, phira lothare de adara hadi'am paida kiti'am. Phira asim hadi'am ute masa carha dita. Phira asim usa nu ika navem rupa vica kharha kita. Tam uha alaha vadi'am barakatam vala ate ati utama sirajanahara hai
Phira isa tom magarom tusim zarura marana hai
Phira tusim ki'amata de dina jida kite ja'uge
Phira asim tuhade la'i sata raha bana'e ate asim khalakata tom bekhabara nahim ho'e
Ate asim asamana tom ika niyata tarike nala pani varasa'i'a. Phira asim usa nu dharati vica roka dita. Ate asim usa nu vapisa laina de vi samaratha ham
Phira asim usa vicom tuhade la'i khajura ate agura de baga paida kite. Tuhade la'i unham vica bahuta sare fala hana ate tusim unham vicom' khande ho
Ate asim uha rukha paida kita jihara sina pahara tom nikalada hai, uha tela lai ke ugada hai ate khana vali'am la'i salana vi
Ate tuhade la'i janavaram vica sikhi'a hai. Asim tuhanu unham de peta vicom cizam (dudha) pila'unde ham. Ate tuhade la'i unham de anekam labha hana ate tusim unham nu khande ho
Ate tusim unham upara ate kisati'am upara savari karade ho
Ate asim nuha nu usa di kauma vala bheji'a tam usa ne akhi'a hai meri kauma! Tusim alaha di badagi karo. Usa tom' binham tuhada ko'i pujanayoga nahim. Ki tusi darade nahim

tam usa di kauma de saradara, jihare inakari sana. Unham ne akhi'a iha tam basa tuhade varaga ika adami hai. Uha cahuda hai ki tuhade upara apana prabhava jama lave. Ate jekara alaha cahuda tam uha farisate bhejada. Asim iha gala apane pichale vaderi'am tom nahim suni
Iha tam basa ika bada hai jisa te pagalapana savara hai â€œtam basa ika samem taka isa di udika karo
Nuha ne akhi'a he mere palanahara! Tu meri madada kara ki'unki inham ne mainu jhuthala dita hai

Tam asim unham nu ika vahi bheji ki tusim sade sahamane ika kisati ti'ara karo sade maraga darasana de anusara. Ate jadom sada hukama a jave ate dharati da pani ubala pave tam hareka kisama de janavaram vicom ika-ika jora lai ke usa (kisati) vica savara ho javo. Ate apane ghara vali'am nu vi sil'ham unham de jinham de sabadha vica pahilam faisala ho zuki'a hai (nala lai lavo? Ate jinham ne zulama kita hai unham de mamale vica mere nala gala na karom. Besaka unham ne dabana hai)
Phira jadom tusim ate tuhade sathi kisati vica baitha jana tam akho ki siphata hai alaha di jisa ne sanu zalima lokam tom baca'i'a
Ate akhom ki hai mere palanahara! Tu mainu barakata vali tham upara utara ate tu sabha tom vadhi'a utarana vala hai
Besaka isa vica nisani'am hana ate besaka asim badi'am da imatihana lainde ham
Phira asim usa tom magarom duja samuha paida kita
Phira unham vicom' him ika rasula unham kola bheji'a ki tusim alaha di ibadata karo usa tom binham tuhada ko'i pujanayoga nahim. Ki tusim darade nahim

ate usa di kauma de saradaram ne jinham ne inakara kita ate praloka di mulakata nu buthala'i'a asim unham nu sasarika jivana vica khusahali bakhasisa kiti si. Unham ne kiha ki iha tam sade varaga hi ika bada hai uhi khanda hai jihara tusim khande ho ate uha hi pinda hai jihara tusim pinde ho
Ate jekara tusim apane varage hi ika bade di gala mani tam tusim vade ghate vica rahaunge
Ki iha bada tuhanu kahida hai ki jadom' tusi mara ja'uge ate miti ate hadi'am ho javoge tam phira tusi' kabaram vicom kadhe ja'unge
Iha phazula galam hana jihari'am tuhanu dasi'am ja rahi'am hana
Jivana tam iho hi hai sasarika jivana. Ithe asim marade ham ate ji'unde ham ate asim phira utha'e jana vale nahim
Iha tam basa ika ajiha bada hai jisa ne alaha upara jhutha marhi'a hai. Ate asim isa nu manana vale nahim
Rasula ne kiha he mere palanahara! Meri madada kara (ki'unki) inham ne mainu jhuthala dita hai
Farama'i'a ki iha loka jaladi hi pachata'unage
Ate unham nu site vajom ika bhi'anaka avaza ne phara li'a. Phira asim unham nu kura kacara bana ke rakha dita. Tam dafa ho'i zalima kaumma
Phira asim unham tom magarom anekam kaumam paida kiti'a
Ko'i kauma na apane va'ade tom age jandi ate na usa tom piche rahidi

Phira asim lagatara apane rasula bheje jadom vi kise kaumma de kola usa da rasula a'i'a tam unham ne usa tom inakara kita. Tam asim ika tom ba'ada ika sari'am da mali'a meta kara dita. Ate asim' unham nu kise kahani'am bana chadi'a. Tam dura hona uha loka jihare imana nahim li'a'unde
Phira asim musa ate usa de bhara haruna nu apani'am nisani'am ate pratakha dalilam de nala bheji'a
Phira'auna ate usa de darabari'am de kola, tam uha hakari loka sana, unham ne hakara kita
Tam unham ne kiha ki ki asim apane varage do adami'am di gala mana la'i'e. Jadom' ki inham di kauma de loka sade gulama hana
Phira unham ne unham nu jhuthala dita. Phira uha nasata kara dite ga'e
Ate asim musa nu kitaba diti tam ki uha raha pa'una
Phira asim mari'ama de bete ate usa di mam nu ika nisani bana'i'a ate asim unham nu ika uci dharati ute ika tikana dita, jihari santi di jag'ha si ate uthe pani da casama vaga riha si
He paigabaro! Sapha cizam kha'u ate cage kama karo. Maim janada ham jo kujha tusim karade ho
Ate iha ki tuhada dharama ika hi dharama hai ate maim tuhada raba ham. Isa la'i tusim mere tom daro
Phira lokam ne apane dharama nu parasapara tukare-tukare kara li'a. Hareka samuha de kola jo vi kujha hai uha use te hi magana hai
Huna unham nu unham di behosi vica kujha dina chada devo
Ki uha samajhade hana ki asim unham nu jihari ja'idada ate aulada de rahe ham
Tam asim unham nu labha pahuca'una la'i saragarama ham. Sagom iha prikhi'a hai. Lekina uha gala nu nahim samajhade
Besaka jihare loka apane raba de prakopa tom darade hana
Ate jihare loka apane raba di'am a'itam upara imana rakhade hana
Ate jihare loka apane raba de barabara kise nu sarika nahim bana'unde
Ate jihare loka de sakade hana uha raba de raha vica dide hana ate unham de dila kabade hana ki uha apane raba vala vapasa jana vale hana
Iha loka cagi'a'i de raha vala bhaja painde hana ate neki'am vica sabha tom age pahucana vale hana
Ate asim kise upara usa di samaratha tom zi'ada bhara nahim pa'unde. Ate sade kola asulam di ika kitaba hai, jihari bilakula sahi boladi hai ate unham upara zulama nahim hovega
Sagom unham de dila usa valom gafila hana ate unham de kujha karama isa tom' binham hana ate uha unham nu karade rahinage
Ithom laganage
Huna benati'am na karo huna sade valom tuhanu ko'i madada nahim pahucegi
Tuhanu meri'am a'itam suna'i'am jandi'am sana tam tusim muha phera ke bhaja jande si
Isa nala hakara karake. Mano, kise kahani'am bi'ana karana vale nu chada rahe ho
Phira ki unham ne isa bani upara vicara nahim kita jam inham de kola ajihi ciza a'i hai jihari inham de pahile pi'u-dadi'am kola nahim a'i
Jam unham ne apane rasula nu nahim pachani'a isa la'i ki uha isa nu nahim manade
Jam uha kahide hana ki isa nu pagalapana hai. Sagom uha inham de kola saca lai ke a'i'a hai. Ate inham vicom zi'adatara nu saci'am galam mari'am lagadi'am hana

Ate jekara saca inham di'am ichavam de adhina huda tam akasa, dharati ate jihara inham de vicakara hai sabha khatama ho janda. Sagom asim inham de kola unham di nasihata (di kitaba) bheji tam uha apani sikhi'a tom muha mora rahe hana
Ki tusim unham tom ko'i daulata maga rahe ho, tam tuhado raba da sarama'i'a tuhade la'i utama hai ate uha hi utama rizaka dena vala hai
Ate nisacita taura te tusim inham nu ika sidhe raha vala sada (bula) rahe ho
Ate jihare loka praloka upara visavasa nahim rakhade uha raha tom bhataka ga'e hana
Ate jekara asim inham upara rahima kari'e ate inham upara jihare kasata hana usa nu dura kara de'i'e tam vi uha virodha vica kurahe pa'e rahinage
Ate asim inham nu saza vica pharhi'a. Paratu na iha apane raba de age jhuke ate na inham ne nimarata dikha'i
Ithom taka ki jadom asim inham upara kathaura saza de daravaze khol'ha devange tam uha usa samem hairana rahi janage
Ate uha hi hai jisa ne tuhade la'i kana, akham ate dila bana'i'a. Tusim bahuta ghata sukara karade ho
Ate uha hi hai jisa ne tuhanu dharati vica phaila'i'a ate tusi' use vala ikathe kite ja'uge
Ate uha hi hai jihara jivata karada hai ate marada hai. Dina ate rata da badalana vi use da adhikara vica hai tam ki tusim nahim samajhade
Sagom unham ne uha hi gala kahi jihari pahili'am ne kahi si
Unham ne kiha ki jadom asim mara javange ate asim miti ate hadi'am ho javange tam ki asim phira utha'e javange
Usa da va'ada sanu ate isa tom pahilam sade pi'um dadi'am nu vi dita gi'a. Iha sirafa purani'am kahani'am hana
Akho ki dharati vica ate jihara kujha isa de adara hai uha kisada hai, jekara tusim janade ho
Uha kahinage iha alaha da hai. Akho, ki phira tusim socade nahim
Akho, ki satam asamanam da malaka kauna hai ate mahana sighasana da malaka kauna hai
Uha kahinage ki sabha alaha da hai. Akho, phira tusim darade ki'um nahim
Akho, ki kauna hai jisa de hatha vica hara ciza da adhikara hai ate uha hi sarana dida hai. Usa de mukabale ko'i sarana nahim de sakada jekara tusim samajhade ho
Uha kahinage ki iha alaha la'i hai. Akho, ki phira kithom tuhade te jadu ho janda hai
sagom asim' unham kola saca li'a'e ham ate yakinana hi uha jhuthe hana

Alaha ne ko'i putara nahim bana'i'a ate na hi usa de barabara ko'i pujanayoga hai. Jekara ajiha huda tam hareka khuda apani khalakata nu lai ke ada ho janda ate uha ika dusare upara hamala karada. Alaha pavitara hai usa tom jihara uha bi'ana karade hana
Uha khuli'am ate gujhi'am nu janana vala hai uha usa nalom bahuta uca hai jisa nu iha usa da sarika bana'unde hana
Akho, ki he mere palanahara! Jekara tu mainu uha dikha deve jisa da inham nala va'ada kita ja riha hai
Tam he mere palanahara! Mainu zalima lokam vica samila na kara
Yakinana asim inham nala jihara va'ada kara rahe ham uha tuhanu dikha dena di takata rakhade ham
Tusim bura'i nu usa tarike nala ronkom jihara vadhi'a hove. Asim cagi tar'ham janade ham jihara iha loka akhade hana
Ate kahom ki he mere palanahara! Maim sarana magada ham, saitanam de sure vicaram tom
Ate he mere palanahara! Maim tere tom sarana magada ham ki uha mere pasa a'una
Ithom taka ki jadom unham vicom`kise nu mauta a jandi hai tam uha kahida hai ki he mere palanahara! Mainu vapisa bhejade
Tam ki jisa nu maim chada a'i'a ham usa vica kujha puna kamavam. Kade vi nahim, iha sirafa ika gala hai jihari uha kahida hai ate unham de age usa dina taka la'i parada hai jadom uha utha'e janage
Phira jadom bigala ja'i'a javega tam unham de vicakara na ko'i risata rahega ate na ko'i kise nu puchega
Phira jinham de palare bhari honage uhi loka safala honage
Ate jinham ne apane apa nu ghate vica pa'i'a unham de palare halake honage. Ate uha naraka vica hamesa rahinage
Unham de cehari'am nu aga jhulasa devegi ate uha usa nala karupa (bada sakala) ho janage
Ki tuhanu meri'am a'itam parha ke nahim suna'i'am jandi'am sana ate phira tusim usa tom inakara karade si
Uha kahinage ki he sade palanahara! Sadi mari kisamata ne sanu ghera li'a ate asim bhatake ho'e loka si
He sade palanahara! Sanu isa vicom kadha lai phira jekara asim ajiha kari'e tam binham saka asim zalima ham
Alaha akhega ki dura ho, ise vica pa'e rahom ate mere nala gala na karo
Mere badi'am vicom ika varaga si jihara kahida si ki he sade palanahara! Asim imana li'a'e ham isa la'i tu sanu mu'afa kara de ate sade upara rahimata kara, tu sabha tom vada rahimata karana vala hai
Tam tusim unham nu mazaka bana li'a ithom taka ki unham tom pichom tusim sadi yada bhula diti ate tusim unham upara hasade rahe
Maim unham nu aja unham de sabara da fala dita hai uha hi safala hona vale hana
Akhi'a javega ki var'hi'am di ginati nala tusim kini dera dharati te rahe
Uha kahinage ki asim ika dina rahe jam ika dina tom vi ghata. Phira ginati vali'am nu pucha lavo
Akhi'a javega ki tusim thorha samam hi rahe. Kasa! Tusim janade hude
Phira ki tusim iha samajhade ho ki asim tuhanu binham makasada tom paida kita hai ate tusim sade kola nahim li'ande ja'uge
Alaha vadi'a'i'am vala hai, saca patasaha hai usa tom binham ko'i pujanayoga nahim uha mahana sighasana da malaka hai

Ate jihara bada alaha de barabara kise hora pujanayoga nu bulave, jisa de pakha vica usa de pasa ko'i pramana nahim tam usa da hisaba kitaba alaha de kaula hai. Bina saka avagi'akari'am nu safalata nahim milegi
Ate akho ki he mere palanahara! Mainu mu'afa kara de ate mere upara rahimata kara. Tu sabha tom caga rahima karana vala hai
